Issue.description: } 2017/03/31 08:56:22 grpc: addrConn.resetTransport failed to create client transport: connection error: desc = "transport: dial tcp 0.0.0.0:7051: getsockopt: connection refused"; Reconnecting to {"0.0.0.0:7051" } 2017/03/31 08:56:22 grpc: addrConn.resetTransport failed to create client transport: connection error: desc = "transport: dial tcp 0.0.0.0:7051: getsockopt: connection refused"; Reconnecting to {"0.0.0.0:7051" } 2017-03-31 08:56:22.485 UTC shim Start -> ERRO 001 Error trying to connect to local peer: grpc: timed out when dialing ~/.go/src/github.com/hyperledger/fabric (master *) $ More people experience this bug: https://chat.hyperledger.org/channel/fabric?msg=zJb8ahpo9Kud3fM9L >
